column4: Hey all. I have a dell 1501 with a broadcom chipset in ubuntu edgy eft. I Have ndiswrapper'd the driver, set it up and my wifi light is lit, but I can't find eth 1 under right clicking the networking icon in the task pane.
wireless doesn't use eth1 it uses wlan
I have never seen that as an option
my light is on but lo, eth 0 , eth1 and sit0 all return nothing when I "iwlist scanning"
